column4: Hi all, upgraded my netbook to 11.04 (finally finished just a bit ago).  Problem is I have no menu or status bar, had to ctl-alt-del to get out of the gnome session.
Is there some what to get the menu back?
Does unity not have a menu or anything?
try deleting .config, .gnome in your home folder, sometime old configuration break when using new version of software, and login back
Will try that, hopefully it works on a netbook :).  Thanks MUCH!
you may want to back it up somewhere
and login back, so you now starting with empy config
Did so, same reboot to get out.
Used "gnome".  Will try "gnome classic" this time.
Thanks much for the help.  First time a dist upgrade that I have done worked :)!!!
